text: enṟesamudāyamē, kāḷakkuṭṭiye (daivamāyi) svīkariccat mukhēna niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷēāṭ tanne an'yāyaṁ ceytirikkukayāṇ‌. atināl niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷuṭe sraṣṭāvilēkk paścāttapicc maṭaṅṅukayuṁ (prāyaścittamāyi) niṅṅaḷ niṅṅaḷetanne nigrahikkukayuṁ ceyyuka. niṅṅaḷuṭe sraṣṭāvinṟe'aṭukkal atāṇ niṅṅaḷkk guṇakaraṁ enn mūsā tanṟejanatayēāṭ paṟañña sandarbhavuṁ (ōrmikkuka). anantaraṁ allāhu niṅṅaḷuṭe paścāttāpaṁ svīkariccu. avan paścāttāpaṁ ēṟe svīkarikkunnavanuṁ karuṇānidhiyumatre
